title: SkiaSharp.Forms is missing wheel events for mouse platforms
body:
First lets say thank you very much for your work. It is great and I enjoy it.

I'm missing for the SkiaSharp implementation for Xamarin.Forms a SKTouchAction.WheelUp and SKTouchAction.WheelDown for the mouse. The click with the wheel is correct handled as MouseButton.Middle. It would be perfect to have this for platforms, that use a mouse (UWP and Mac).

> VS bug [#727960](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/727960)
